title: Accused for Scripting for the first time
body: So, recently, I have been accused for 'scripting' in one of my {{champion:134}} games. However, I do not know how I was scripting in any way, nor did he even mention how I scripted. If I get falsely reported for scripting, do I risk a ban for this?

replies.body: its like people accusing you of taking steroids, just take it as a compliment and know that you're a better person than them

Basically this, if you did nothing wrong you won't get in trouble. Take joy in the fact that you so thoroughly fucked someone that they accused you of cheating. Some people just throw out the "you cheated" thing because they can't believe they are anything less than perfect. It happened to me with chess once; I don't think I've cried while laughing harder in my life since.
